user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's input and the TYNDP 2026 scenario specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios ('NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE') for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now', select the most appropriate attribute from the following list.

tasks.description: Split the nodes as required by the scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '...Split the nodes...', select the most appropriate object from the following list.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '...Convert to tst format', select the most appropriate object from the following list.
